skos:ConceptScheme.dc:description: Observed Property describes the Phenomenon for which the Observation result provides an estimate of its value.

skos:Concept.skos:definition: The semi-thickness of the F2 layer in assumption of a parabolic layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Electric Field Vector Components in SC
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Electric field vector components of electromagnetic wave in spacecraft coordinates
The ordinary wave critical frequency of the lowest think layer stratification in the E region of ionosphere that causes a discontinuity in the height of E trace

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum frequency of ionospheric reflections in Es layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency of Es trace

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Spectral Density (power or amplitude)
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Spectral Density of the B-field component of EM-wave in terms of its power or amplitude per unit frequency band

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Peak density of an irregular plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The height of the maximum density in an irregular plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Parabolic-approximation peak height of F2 layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak height of F2 layer in assumption of a single parabolic layer with no underlying ionization,obtained as the virtual height of the ordinary wave trace at the frequency of 0.834 x foF2
The highest frequency for ionospheric transmission over an oblique path of 3000 km through F2 region of ionosphere determined from ionograms via conventional transmission curve

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Electric Field Spectral Density (power or voltage)
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Spectral Density of the E-field component of EM-wave in terms of its power or voltage per unit frequency band
The eastward declination of the horizontal B-field component from geographic north pole [degrees]
Flux of energetic protons
The resonance frequency of the electron upper hybrid oscillations

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of E2 layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace for the E2 region of ionosphere
Magnetic field vector of electromagnetic L-Mode

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Peak density of an irregular plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak electron density of an irregular plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Range Spread of F layer trace
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The average range spread of F trace
The Standard M-Factor: the ratio of the Standard Maximum Usable Frequency over the Critical Frequency

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Amplitude Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Amplitude Spectral Density (ASD) of the B-field component of EM-wave,[nT/root-Hz]
Flux of energetic electrons
The lower frequency at which wave propagation in particular mode becomes impossible
The extraordinary mode critical frequency of a plasma layer
The top extraordinary wave frequency of the spread F traces
The peak height of the E layer in assumption of a parabolic layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Travel Time of EM X-Wave Echo
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Travel time of electromagnetic X-wave reflected and returned to the source region
Photon flux in the visible spectrum.
The proton drift velocity vector
Number density of electrons
Scintillation index derived from amplitude variations of GPS signal
Electric field vector of electrostatic wave

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ES-wave Electric Field Vector Components in SC coordinates
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Electric field vector components of electromagnetic wave in spacecraft (SC) coordinates
Photon flux in the extreme ultraviolet spectrum.
Number density of ions

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Frequency Spread of E layer trace
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The average frequency spread below foE

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Top Frequency of Reflections from Plasma Layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The highest frequency at which reflections are observed in a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Height of peak density of regular plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The height of the maximum density in a regular plasma layer
Minimum of electric field potential determined over a set of available values
The X-component (northward) of the DC magnetic field in North-East-Down geographic coordinates

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Field Strength in Horizontal Plane
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The magnitude of the DC magnetic field in the horizontal plane parallel to Earth surface
Minimum virtual height of the trace used to determine foP
TThe shape parameter D1 of the electron density profile using IRI formalism

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the O-Mode trace of reflections from a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Frequency of Reflections from Plasma Layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency at which reflections are observed from a plasma layer
Position of a feature of interest in space

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Virtual Height of a Plasma Layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Virtual height of a plasma layer obtained by remote sensing technique from the signal travel time in assumption of an ordinary-wave propagation at the speed of light

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Spectral Density Components in HDZ coordinates
skos:Concept.skos:definition: B-field Power Spectral Density (PSD) components in HDZ system of coordinates
The peak height of the F1 layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Travel Time of EM Wave Echo
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Travel time of electromagnetic wave reflected and returned to the source region
The total width in frequency of the scatter pattern of F layer echoes

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Virtual Height of X trace at foF2
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The virtual height of the extraordinary wave trace at foF2
The Z-Mode cutoff frequency
The lowest frequency at which second order echo traces are observed on the ionogram
Measure of terrestrial ring current intensity based on ground-based magnetic measurements
MUF for a 3000 km path through a region of ionosphere
The ion drift velocity vector

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Semi-thickness of a parabolic layer of plasma
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The semi-thickness of a parabolic layer of plasma

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ES-wave Electric Field Spectral Density (power or voltage)
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Spectral Density of ES-wave in terms of its E-field power or voltage per unit frequency band
A parameter of electron density profile shape used in IRI
The DC electric field strength (partial specification of Electric Field)
Electric field strength of electromagnetic wave
The Standard M-Factor for 3000 km distance

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ES-wave Electric Field Voltage Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Voltage Spectral Density (VSD) of the ES-wave,[Vrms/root-Hz]
The ordinary mode critical frequency of a plasma layer
The Standard M-Factor at 3000 km distance of F2 layer propagation defined as the ratio of the Standard Maximum Usable Frequency over the Critical Frequency

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Peak density of a plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak electron density of a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Parabolic-approximation peak height of F2 layer,with correction
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak height of F2 layer in assumption of a single parabolic layer with correction for underlying ionization,obtained by fitting of hF curve
Proton temperature

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Power Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Power Spectral Density (PSD) of the B-field component of EM-wave,[nT2/Hz]

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Daily average index of geomagnetic activity, Ap
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Global scale index of geomagnetic activity linked to Kp, derived by taking the individual station K-indices in log scale, converting them to linear values (ap, small a), and then averaging these all together over one day and all stations
A critical frequency of a plasma layer
Zonal component of neutral bulk wind velocity

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Number of Electron Bernstein Frequency Harmonics
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Number of the last observable harmonic of the electron Bernstein mode oscillations
Ratio of particle temperatures in a composite gas
Harmonics of the electron cyclotron frequency

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Lowest frequency of Spread F echoes
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency of the spread F traces
Difference between maximum and minimum values of electric field potential determined over a set of available values
Particle transport flux of photons counted within the acceptance solid angle, the energy passband, and detection bin of a detector.
Ion temperature
The highest frequency for transmission over an oblique path of 3000 km through F1 region of ionosphere determined from ionograms via conventional transmission curve
Ion-neutral collision frequency
MUF: the highest frequency for ionospheric transmission over an oblique path
The resonance frequency of electron cyclotron oscillations
The peak height of the F2 layer
The resonance frequency of the electron Bernstein mode oscillations
The extraordinary wave critical frequency of the highest stratification in the F region of ionosphere

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Travel Time of EM O-Wave Echo
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Travel time of electromagnetic O-wave reflected and returned to the source region
Electric field vector of electromagnetic wave
The peak height of the E layer
Doppler frequency shift of the propagating electromagnetic wave
The electron drift velocity vector

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Frequency Spread of F layer trace
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The average frequency spread between fxF2 and fxI
The LOCATION observed property is used in the Observation XML files that correspond to the location of a satellite
The ordinary wave critical frequency of F1 region
The angular frequency of a stimulated oscillation of a charged particle

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Height of a layer at half peak density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: True height of the layer at its half peak density
Neutral temperature
Electric field vector of electromagnetic O-polarization wave
The top ordinary wave frequency at which reflections are observed in a plasma layer
The thickness of the electron density profile B0 using IRI formalism
TThe shape parameter B1 of the electron density profile using IRI formalism
The peak electron density of the Es layer
The peak electron density of the F3 layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: A parameter of the Chapman model of a plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: A parameter of electron density profile shape used in the Chapman model
Projection of neutral bulk wind velocity on a plane
Average number of collisions between particles per unit of time
The ordinary wave critical frequency of the highest stratification in the F region of ionosphere
The magnetic field vector of electromagnetic wave
The DC electric field strength and direction

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of Ea layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace for the auroral E region of ionosphere
The resonance frequency associated with electron oscillations
The peak height of the F3 layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Electric Field Power Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Power Spectral Density (PSD) of the E-field component of EM-wave,[V2rms/m2Hz]

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Spectral Density for R-wave
skos:Concept.skos:definition: B-field Power Spectral Density (PSD) for R-wave polarization
Number density of protons

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Kappa Index of Plasma Particle Velocity Distribution
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Kappa parameter of the Kappa distribution describing plasma particle velocities in a dual-population medium containing high-velocity particles that deviate from the classic Maxwellian velocity distribution.
The lowest frequency at which third order echo traces are observed on the ionogram
Number density of the atomic oxygen ion
Category type of a layer
The Standard M-Factor at 3000 km distance of F1 layer propagation defined as the ratio of the Standard Maximum Usable Frequency over the Critical Frequency
The potential of the electric field
Temperature of atomic oxygen ions O
The average range spread of a diffuse echo trace
The ordinary wave critical frequency of the thick layer of additional ionization in the auroral E region caused by precipitating particles of magnetospheric origin
The ordinary wave critical frequency of the intermediate stratification between the normal F1 and F2 layers
The peak height of the Es layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Absorption of EM-wave E-field radio emissions
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Absorption of radio waves observed by electric antenna
The resonance frequency of the ion cyclotron oscillations
Proportions of particle densities in a composite gas
A component of neutral bulk wind velocity vector
The average frequency spread between X-Mode critical and top frequencies
A parameter of electron density profile shape model approximation
The lowest ordinary wave frequency at which the Es layer becomes transparent

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of F1 layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace for the F1 region of ionosphere
Number of the last observable harmonic of the electron cyclotron frequency
Polarization of the propagating electromagnetic wave
Scintillation index derived from phase fluctuations of the GPS signal

Global average of the deviation of the most disturbed horizontal component of the magnetic field on a number of fixed magnetic stations (each with their own local K-index). It is a logarithmic scale based on an algorithm that puts the averages of the individual stations together
Magnetic field vector of electromagnetic R-Mode
The peak height of the Ea layer
Vertical component of neutral bulk wind velocity
Position of the Earth plasmapause in space

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Height of peak density of plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The height of the maximum density in a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Northward NED Field Strength Variation
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Variation of the NED X-component (northward geographic) of B-field about its mean value
A characterization of the shape of the Es trace
The z-Mode wave critical frequency of the highest stratification in the F region of ionosphere
Power of the propagating electromagnetic wave
The semi-thickness of the F1 layer in assumption of a parabolic layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum frequency of ionospheric reflections in E region
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency of E trace
The Z-component (downward vertical) of the B-field
The O-Mode cutoff frequency at the spacecraft location
The resonance frequency of electron density oscillations (Langmuir waves)

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Virtual Height of an extraordinary wave trace at given frequency
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The virtual height of X trace at given frequency
The Standard M-Factor at 3000 km distance of F2 layer propagation in spread F conditions
The highest frequency at which the Es trace is observed
Ratio of electron and ion temperatures
The extraordinary wave critical frequency of F1 region
Number density of the atomic helium ion He

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Chapman-approximation scale height of plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The scale height parameter of a plasma layer in assumption of the Chapman model
The minimum non-vertical (slant) virtual range of the spread F traces
The top ordinary wave frequency of the F region patch traces

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of Es layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace used to give foEs
The peak electron density of the Ea layer
The top extraordinary wave frequency at which reflections are observed in a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Eastward HDZ Field Strength Variation
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Variation of the eastward D-component of B-field about its mean value

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Northward HDZ Field Strength Variation
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Variation of the northward H-component of B-field about its mean value

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of E layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace for the E region of ionosphere
TEC integrated along a slant path from spacecraft to ground
Electric field vector of electromagnetic X-polarization wave
Horizontal component of neutral bulk wind velocity
The peak electron density of the F2 layer
Position of the boundary between two different plasma regions
The X-Mode cutoff frequency at the spacecraft location
Electron temperature
True height at half peak electron density of F2 layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum frequency of ionospheric reflections in F region
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency of F trace
Electric field Strength of electrostatic wave
The Z-mode wave critical frequency of the lowest thick layer in E region

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Spectral Density for L-wave
skos:Concept.skos:definition: B-field Power Spectral Density (PSD) for L-wave polarization
Meridional component of neutral bulk wind velocity
The peak electron density of the E layer
The Z-Mode critical frequency of a plasma layer
The Z-component of the DC magnetic field in GSM system of coordinates
The Y-component of the DC magnetic field in GSM system of coordinates
The X-component of the DC magnetic field in GSM system of coordinates

skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace between foF1 and foF1.5
The peak electron density of the F1 layer
The DC magnetic field strength and direction

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of F2 layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace for the highest stable stratification in the F region of ionosphere

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum Virtual Height of F layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The minimum virtual height of the ordinary wave trace in F region taken as a whole
TEC along a vertical path from ground

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Range Spread of E layer trace
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The average range spread of E trace
Total Electron Content (TEC) integrated along a path in plasma layer
A parameter of the parabolic shape model of electron density profile

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Northward Directed HDZ Field Strength
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The northward H-component of the DC magnetic field in HDZ/Compass system of coordinates

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Magnetic Eastward Directed HDZ Field Strength
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The eastward D-component of the DC magnetic field in HDZ/Compass system of coordinates

The resonance frequency associated with ion oscillations

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Peak density of a regular plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak electron density of a regular plasma layer
Altitude of Constant Atmospheric Pressure

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Magnetic Field Vector Components in HDZ coordinates
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The magnetic field vector of the electromagnetic wave given as components in HDZ system of coordinates
The highest ordinary wave frequency at which a mainly continuous Es trace is observed

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Chapman-approximation scale height of F2 layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The scale height parameter of the F2 layer in assumption of the Chapman layer model
The extraordinary wave critical frequency of the lowest thick layer stratification in the E region of ionosphere
The DC magnetic field strength (partial specification of Magnetic Field)

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Virtual Height of a trace at given frequency
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The virtual height of an echo trace at given frequency
The Y-component (eastward) of the DC magnetic field in North-East-Down geographic coordinates

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Kappa Index of Particle Velocity Distribution
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Kappa parameter of the Kappa distribution describing particle velocities in a dual-population medium containing high-velocity particles that deviate from the classic Maxwellian velocity distribution
The ordinary wave critical frequency of an acculting thick layer appearing between the normal E and F1 layers

skos:Concept.skos:definition: Variation of the NED Y-component (eastward geographic) of B-field about its mean value
The top ordinary wave frequency of the spread F traces

Temperature of atomic helium ions

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: ES-wave Electric Field Power Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Power Spectral Density (PSD) of the ES-wave,[V2rms/m2Hz]

Direction of the propagating electromagnetic wave

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Peak height of a parabolic plasma layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The peak height of a parabolic layer of plasma
The maximum potential of electric field determined over a set of available values
Proportions of particle densities in a composite gas

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: Minimum frequency of Reflections from Plasma Layer
skos:Concept.skos:definition: The lowest frequency at which reflections are observed from a plasma layer

skos:Concept.skos:prefLabel: EM-wave Electric Field Voltage Spectral Density
skos:Concept.skos:definition: Voltage Spectral Density (VSD) of the E-field component of EM-wave,[Vrms/root-Hz]
An interconnected set of oscillations of charged particles and electric field that leaves the magnetic field unperturbed
The lowest ordinary wave frequency at which a layer becomes transparent

Form of energy that shows wave-like behavior as it travels through the propagation medium,with in-phase oscillating E-field and B-field both perpendicular to each other and to the direction of the wave propagation.
